title: Stocks end week at fresh records as Nvidia tops $2 tn
text:
Cloudy skies with afternoon snow showers. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.. Rain and snow showers this evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch. Updated: March 30, 2024 @ 10:08 am          Wall Street stocks finished the week with a flourish Friday behind continued momentum for equities tied to artificial intelligence, especially Nvidia, which finished wih a valuation above $2 trillion for the first time. Both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq ended at fresh all-time highs following records in Tokyo and Frankfurt. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content.
